sentences.sContent: Pretending he doesn’t remember is an old trick of his.
sentences.sCn: 假装不记得是他的老花招了。

sentences.sContent: He didn’t really lose his wallet - that’s just a trick.
sentences.sCn: 他并没有真的丢了钱包——这只是一个骗局。

sentences.sContent: ...Although it hardly seems practical to trick ourselves into eating less...
...These findings echo earlier research that suggests our perception of food can sometimes trick our body's response to the food itself...
...We envy famous men and imagine that fame was due to some trick of luck...
